${ModID}:BasicWave.NAME: Basic Wave
${ModID}:BasicWave.DESCRIPTION: Play a *Defend and a *Strike. NL Counts as a ${ModID}:Basic card.

${ModID}:Simplify.NAME: Simplify
${ModID}:Simplify.DESCRIPTION: Draw !M! ${ModID}:Basic card and Upgrade it. This can Upgrade it any number of times.
${ModID}:Simplify.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Draw !M! ${ModID}:Basic cards and Upgrade them. This can Upgrade them any number of times.

${ModID}:LoseIt.NAME: Lose It
${ModID}:LoseIt.DESCRIPTION: Innate. NL Add a *Rummage to your hand. Set the cost of your *Rummages to !M!. Exhaust.
${ModID}:LoseIt.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Innate. NL Add a *Rummage+ to your hand. Set the cost of your *Rummages to !M!. Exhaust.

${ModID}:SimplifiedStrike.NAME: Simplified Strike
${ModID}:SimplifiedStrike.DESCRIPTION: ${ModID}:Unnate. NL Deal !M! damage for each ${ModID}:Basic card you played this combat.

${ModID}:FamiliarKit.NAME: Familiar Kit
${ModID}:FamiliarKit.DESCRIPTION: Gain !M! Strength, !M! Dexterity and !${ModID}:m2! Focus. ${ModID}:Pickup: Obtain a *Bash, *Survivor and *Zap.
${ModID}:FamiliarKit.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Innate. NL Gain !M! Strength, !M! Dexterity and !${ModID}:m2! Focus. ${ModID}:Pickup: Obtain a *Bash, *Survivor and *Zap.

${ModID}:OckhamsRazor.NAME: Ockhams Razor
${ModID}:OckhamsRazor.DESCRIPTION: Whenever you play a ${ModID}:Basic card, deal !M! damage to all enemies.

${ModID}:BackToBasic.NAME: Back To Basic
${ModID}:BackToBasic.DESCRIPTION: Discard your hand and draw !M! ${ModID}:Basic cards. Gain [E] .
${ModID}:BackToBasic.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Discard your hand and draw !M! ${ModID}:Basic cards. Gain [E] [E] .

${ModID}:StrikePlus.NAME: Strike Plus
${ModID}:StrikePlus.DESCRIPTION: Add a *Strike to your hand and Upgrade it !M! times. Exhaust. NL ${ModID}:Pickup: Obtain a *Strike.

${ModID}:ConjureDefends.NAME: Conjure Defends
${ModID}:ConjureDefends.DESCRIPTION: Add a *Defend+ to your draw pile and ${ModID}:Modify it: "Played X additional times". Exhaust. NL ${ModID}:Pickup: Obtain a *Defend.
${ModID}:ConjureDefends.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Add a *Defend+ to your draw pile and ${ModID}:Modify it: "Played X+1 additional times". Exhaust. NL ${ModID}:Pickup: Obtain a *Defend.

${ModID}:SimpleTrick.NAME: Simple Trick
${ModID}:SimpleTrick.DESCRIPTION: Add a *Cardistry to your hand. The next !M! times you play one, gain [E] .
${ModID}:SimpleTrick.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Add a *Cardistry+ to your hand. The next !M! times you play one, gain [E] .
